sentences.en: Although officially a dependent territory the island is effectively autonomous.
sentences.cn: 虽然正式说来这个岛是附属领土,但实际上是自治的.

sentences.en: Do you have any dependent children (= who you are still supporting financially ) ?
sentences.cn: 你有没有需要扶养的孩子？
男人也会产生共依存性。

sentences.en: Her behaviour was childlike and dependent.
sentences.cn: 她的言行举止像个孩子，依赖性强。

sentences.en: I resent being dependent on her.
sentences.cn: 我很讨厌自己对她的依赖。

sentences.en: In his own way, he was dependent on her.
sentences.cn: 他以自己的方式依赖着她。

sentences.en: It is largely dependent on the weather.
sentences.cn: 这多半取决于天气情况.

sentences.en: Jan’s mother was dependent on her for physical care.
sentences.cn: 简的母亲要靠简来照顾。

sentences.en: Just 26 per cent of households are married couples with dependent children.
sentences.cn: 只有26%的家庭是有孩子要扶养的已婚夫妇。

sentences.en: Matt is weak and dependent, but you love him all the same.
sentences.cn: 马特软弱无能且依赖性强，但我们照样爱他。

sentences.en: Political selection is more dependent on sophistry and less on economic literacy.
sentences.cn: 政治选举更多地取决于诡辩的能力，而不在于是否懂经济。

sentences.en: She had grown ever more peevishly dependent on him.
sentences.cn: 她脾气变得更坏，对他的依赖更重了。

sentences.en: She had no means of subsistence and was dependent on charity.
sentences.cn: 她没什么谋生手段,只能依靠救济.

sentences.en: The area is heavily dependent on tourism.
sentences.cn: 这个地区非常依赖旅游业。

sentences.en: The charity is totally dependent on the Church's bounty.
sentences.cn: 慈善业完全依靠全体基督徒的慷慨赠予.

sentences.en: The program is geared around the problems of being a co-dependent.
sentences.cn: 这个节目关注共依存者面临的各种问题。

sentences.en: They are dependent upon importation from foreign countries for cotton and grain.
sentences.cn: 他们的粮、棉依赖从国外进口.

words.tran_cn: 可靠的，可信赖的；可信任的
依赖，依靠；取决于；相信，信赖

phrases.tran_cn: 受抚养孩子，受供养子女；依赖其供养的子女

trans.tran_en: needing someone or something in order to exist, be successful, be healthy etc
